data.title: David H. Lee, MD
data.meta_description: David H. Lee, MD, specializes in Primary Care (Internal Medicine) at Ochsner Health in New Orleans, LA
data.text:
To Schedule a Virtual Visit with This Provider:

From a Mobile Device, Tablet or Computer:

Log in to MyOchsner (from a computer) or the MyChart application (from mobile or tablet, available for iOS and Android)

Select Schedule An Appointment under the Visits menu (desktop) or Appointments section (mobile or tablet)

Schedule with a provider you’ve seen before, or select New Provider or Same Day Care

Answer the prompted questions, and select Yes to schedule a virtual visit

Choose a provider

Select your appointment time

Select schedule to confirm

For more details, please visit the MyOchsner page. Please ensure that sure your mobile device is updated with the latest iOS or Android software before attempting a Virtual Visit.

A Note for Patients on Provider Availability:

David H. Lee, MD, is able to see patients residing in the following states: Louisiana. Please confirm your eligibility before booking a virtual visit with this provider.

To Schedule a Virtual Visit with This Provider:

Log in to the MyChart Application

(Available for iOS or Android)

Select Schedule An Appointment under the Appointments section

Schedule with a provider you’ve seen before, or select New Provider or Same Day Care

Answer the prompted questions, and select Yes to schedule a virtual visit

Choose a provider

Select your appointment time

Select schedule to confirm

For more details, please visit the MyOchsner page. Please ensure that sure your mobile device is updated with the latest iOS or Android software before attempting a Virtual Visit.
